content:
Comments Received

  • Two comments from Keith Moore so far:

    • GUID/UUID: WebDAV references Leach/Salz I-D for UUIDs, but ISO DCE RPC standard also defines the same UUIDs.
      • WebDAV should reference the ISO DCE RPC spec. instead.
    • XML Namespace “src” scalability: Since the “src” attribute can be used to retrieve an XML schema, if src is an HTTP URL, this could be a scalability chokepoint.
      • WebDAV should note this concern in the spec.
